fuzzing.short_description: Fuzzing Test involves sending malformed inputs to the application to discover potential vulnerabilities.
fuzzing.remediation: Implement robust input validation and error handling. Conduct regular security testing.

subdomainEnumeration.short_description: Subdomain Enumeration identifies subdomains associated with a domain, which can be used to discover additional attack surfaces.
subdomainEnumeration.remediation: Ensure proper security configurations for all subdomains. Regularly monitor and audit subdomains.

directoryListing.short_description: Directory Listing vulnerability allows attackers to view directories and files on the server.
directoryListing.remediation: Disable directory listing on the server. Implement proper access controls.

graphql_intro.short_description: GraphQL Introspection allows an attacker to discover the structure of a GraphQL schema and potentially sensitive information.
graphql_intro.remediation: Disable GraphQL introspection in production environments. Implement proper authentication and authorization checks.
